summary: The module provides utilities for managing and migrating legacy configuration files used by the Mission Support System UI prior to version 9.0.0. It defines a repository of default UI settings (including map projections, interpolation methods, service URLs, and waypoint presets) and offers functions to read, write, merge, and adjust configuration data, handling duplicate entries and ensuring compatibility with newer formats.
business_intent: Enable seamless upgrades of the Mission Support System by preserving user preferences and translating old configuration structures into the current format, thereby reducing migration effort and preventing loss of custom settings during version transitions.
